extension.summary: Catch-Up TV & More : Replay TV, Live TV et bien plus encore.
extension.description: Catch-Up TV & More regroupe dans un même plugin Kodi l'ensemble des vidéos des différents services et chaînes de Replay TV (rattrapage TV) ainsi que l'accès au direct. De plus, cette extension vous permet d'accéder rapidement aux vidéos et contenus proposés par certains sites internet.
extension.disclaimer: Retours de bugs, propositions d'améliorations ou d'ajout de contenus sont les bienvenue ! GitHub ou e-mail.
extension.summary: Catch-Up TV & More: It's all in the title.
extension.description: Catch-Up TV & More brings together in one Kodi add-on all the videos of the various services and channels of catch-up TV and live TV. Furthermore, this add-on allows you to quickly access the videos and content offered by certain websites.
extension.disclaimer: Bug reports, suggestions for improvements or content additions are welcome! GitHub or e-mail.
extension.description: ההרחבה מאפשרת לך להתעדכן בתוכן השידורים תוסף אחד של קודי מרכז את כל קטעי וידאו של שירותים שונים וערוצי תוכן משודר. בנוסף, תוספת זו מאפשרת לך לגשת במהירות לסרטונים ולתכנים המוצעים על ידי אתרים מסוימים.
extension.disclaimer: דוחות שגיאה, הצעות לשיפור או תוספות תוכן יתקבלו בברכה! ל-GitHub או אימייל.
extension.summary: Catch-Up TV & More: Replay tv, Live tv en meer.
extension.description: Catch-Up TV & More brengt replay en live tv van verschikkende diensten en kanalen samen in één Kodi add-on. Bovendien stelt deze add-on u instaat video's van bepaalde websites makkelijk te benaderen.
extension.disclaimer: Bug meldingen, suggesties ter verbetering of additionele inhouden zijn welkom! Via GitHub of e-mail.
extension.news: [Version 0.2.38] [IT - RADIOFRECCIA] Add Radiofreccia Web TV (PR #675) Thanks @darodi [FR - LEQUIPE] Add additional lives (issue #481) [FR - EQUIDIA] Use the more generic Equidia-racing instead of multiple channels [FR - RMCBFMPLAY] Make sure to not use item_id again [FR] Rearrange skeleton [IT - RADIOFRECCIA] Enable multiple resolutions [FR - RMCBFMPLAY] Avoid a problem of conversion UTF-8 into ASCII (issue #678) [Project] Update the requested version of resource.images.catchuptvandmore (issue #680) [FR - RMCBFMPlay] Call get_token and get_account_id only when needed [Project] Remove print [FR - MYCANAL] Code cleanup thanks @Arias800 [IT - RADIOFRECCIA] Make it work without inputstream.adaptive thanks @darodi [Project] PR workflow: flake8 with forks - fix test-plugin-modules (PR #686) thanks @darodi [BE - TV LUX] Fix live (PR #687) thanks @darodi [WO - EURONEWS] Update Euronews link (PR #679) thanks @adrien3287 [BE - TV LUX] Small pattern fix (PR #689) thanks @darodi [FR - MYCANAL] Fix flake8 (PR #690) thanks @darodi [Project] Revert commit 27b088548a870901fd629e77c95b442549dabe03 (issue #688) [XMLTV] Fix issue if 'episode-num' format is wrong in xmltv file [XMLTV] Add default XMLTV id for CA channels [FR - LIVE] Add Sud Radio (issue #696) [Project] Make Flake8 happy [XMLTV] Support Schedules Direct (see addon settings) for canadian channels [FR - RMCBFMPLAY] Fix a compatibility issue with Leia and below (issue #678) [XMLTV] Avoid Python 3 specific syntax not available in Leia and below [SD] Fix encoding issue on Linux computers [XMLTV] Fix f-strings for Python2 [IT - RADIOFRECCIA] Choose quality without inputstream.adaptive thanks @darodi [XMLTV] FIx the type of the opened file thanks @JungleJim42 [IT - RTL 102.5] Add radio lives (PR #705 issue #704) thanks @darodi [IT -
